title: Speech To Sign
description: Built an automatic speech recognition model to convert speech to text and further to Indian Sign Language. Achieved an accuracy of 73% for the model and integrated the model with frontend.

title: Siksha Mitra
description: A study tool for students to detect drowsiness of a person while studying using face recognition. The systems alarms the user(if drowsy), suggest tips to get rid of drowsiness and shows motivational quotes to keep him boosted.

title: Audio Sentiment Analysis
description: Achieved an accuracy of 73% in performing sentiment analysis on basis of audio clips using machine learning algorithms specifically CNN, LSTM and SVM and compared accuracies of results obtained using all three models

title: Number Trivia
description: The NUMBER TRIVIA is a flutter app in which user enters a number and some interesting facts about that number is displayed

title: ToDo App
description: An android app to schedule and manage tasks using the concept of local storage using hive. A count-down timer is added for each task showing the time left and a local notification is given 24 hours prior to the scheduled time of the task.
